p: HPLC standards of analyzed pigments were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MI, USA) including α-carotene (purity ≥ 97%), chlorophyll a (purity ≥ 95%), lutein (purity ≥ 96%) and fucoxanthin (purity ≥ 97%) while β-carotene (purity ≥ 95%) was purchased from Dr. Ehrenstorfer (Augsburg, Germany).
